title: About how many pages is a 750 word essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: I worked my way through university doing free-lance editing and translating. The industry standard according to which we got paid was 300 words per page. So, 2.5 pages. Your word processor should be able to count the words for you, so this a very old-fashioned kind of question. But unless this is some kind of flash-fiction competition, 750 words is likely to be a guideline. If this is for school or college, your tutor is sick of people handing in half-page essays. But nobody ever got penalised for being twenty words under or over the limit. Keeping that in mind, use as many words as you need to tell your story, to show what you know. Then stop. Padding your essay to reach some arbitrary limit is not a good idea.

A word count of 750 words will equal about 1.5 pages single spaced or 3 pages double spaced. Of course it will depend on the word processor settings, what font and font size you're using and page margins. However, with a standard 12 point Arial or Times New Roman font and default page margins your results should be about the same. If you need some help with writing an essay you can use help of essayhack.org - essay writing service. Answer: 750 words is 1½ pages single spaced or 3 pages double spaced.

Assuming that your paper uses standard formatting (12 point Times New Roman, double spaced), 750 words range from 2.5 to 3 pages depending on the lengths of paragraphs and use of topics and subtopics (or lack thereof). 1 page is 275 words on average.

Depends on the page size,line spacing,page margin size,font type and size.For a 8.5″ X 11″ size paper with 1 inch margins, if you are using something like Arial 10 or 12 points and 1.5 line spacing, you should be able squeeze in about 300 to 350 words to a page, which would translate to 2.5 or 3 pages for a 700 word essay. Play around with the above variables to come up with your own exact answer.

In 12-point Times New Roman font, double-spaced, with standard margins of one inch around except for the 1.5 inch top margin, and the typical vocabulary of a college freshman, you’re getting about 300 words a page. So 750 is 2.5 pages.
